title: The Dad Movie Hall of Fame. Plus: the Kickass Action of ‘The Old Guard’
description:
We're still stuck at home, but another wave of new movie releases arrives this weekend, including Netflix's exciting new Charlize Theron action film 'The Old Guard,' the delightfully high-concept 'Palm Springs' on Hulu, and the Tom Hanks World War II story 'Greyhound' on Apple TV+. Sean and Amanda break down all three, before inviting The Ringer's Kevin Clark on to help construct the Dad Movie Hall of Fame (1:25). Then, Sean is joined by 'The Old Guard' director Gina Prince-Bythewood to discuss her new film (1:10:57).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Kevin Clark and Gina Prince-Bythewood
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
